document_data.name: Preservers of the Ordered Way
document_data.orgname: the Preservers of the Ordered Way
document_data.mainbody: The '''Preservers of the Ordered Way''' was a monastic order devoted to [[Deneir]], the Lord of All Glyphs.
document_data.Activities: The [[monk]]s of the Preservers of the Ordered Way focused their attentions on copying and illuminating texts. As a whole these monks kept to themselves in order to focus on their work.
